00014 void init(void *args){
00015         int i, status;
00016         pid_t pid;
00017         process_t *processTable;
00018         
00019         processTable = getProcessTable();
00020         
00021         setProcessAtomicity(getpid(), ATOMIC);
00022         if ( (pid = createProcess("welcome", (void (*)(void *))welcome, NULL, FOREGROUND)) == -1 ) {
00023                 puts("ERROR: Welcome could not be created.\n");
00024         }               
00025         setTty(pid, 0);
00026         setProcessAtomicity(getpid(), UNATOMIC);
00027         
00028         while(processTable[0].childsQty){
00029                 asm volatile("hlt");
00030         }
00031         
00032         setProcessAtomicity(getpid(), ATOMIC);
00033         for ( i = 0; i < MAX_TTY; ++i ) {
00034                 if ( (pid = createProcess("sh", (void (*)(void *))shell, NULL, FOREGROUND)) == -1 ) {
00035                         puts("ERROR: A Shell could not be created.\n");
00036                 }               
00037                 setTty(pid, i);
00038                 setTTYMode(pid, TTY_CANONICAL);
00039         }       
00040         setProcessAtomicity(getpid(), UNATOMIC);
00041                 
00042         while(processTable[0].childsQty > 0){
00043                 wait(&status);
00044                 asm volatile("hlt");
00045         }
00046         
00047         setProcessAtomicity(getpid(), ATOMIC);
00048         if ( (pid = createProcess("goodbye", (void (*)(void *))goodbye, NULL, FOREGROUND)) == -1 ) {
00049                 puts("ERROR: Goodbye could not be created.\n");
00050         }               
00051         setTty(pid, 0);
00052         setProcessAtomicity(getpid(), UNATOMIC);
00053         
00054         while(processTable[0].childsQty){
00055                 asm volatile("hlt");
00056         }
00057         
00058         rebootSystem();
00059         
00060         return;
00061 }

00217 void welcome(){
00218         unsigned curTime;
00219         int j = 0;
00220         char *msg;
00221         
00222         curTime = upTime();
00223         clearTTYScreen();
00224         
00225         msg = "\n\tWelcome, you're Flying-High at 1.0 meters!!\n\n";
00226         
00227         puts(msg);
00228 
00229         puts("\t\tInitializing Drivers..............................................");
00230 
00231         ++j;
00232         
00233         while(upTime() < curTime + j * TICKS_PER_SECOND);
00234 
00235         puts("Done.\n");
00236         
00237         puts("\n\t\tEnabling Interrupts...............................................");
00238 
00239         ++j;
00240         
00241         while(upTime() < curTime + j * TICKS_PER_SECOND);
00242         
00243         puts("Done.\n");        
00244 
00245         puts("\n\tInitializing Shells...................................................");
00246 
00247         initGlobalDataShell();
00248         
00249         ++j;
00250         
00251         while(upTime() < curTime + j * TICKS_PER_SECOND);
00252         
00253         puts("Done.\n");
00254         
00255         puts("\n\tReady, have fun!!\n\n");
00256         
00257         return;

00260 void goodbye(){
00261         unsigned curTime;
00262         int j = 0;
00263         
00264         clearTTYScreen();
00265         
00266         curTime = upTime();
00267         
00268         puts("\nNo processes running, starting system reboot...\n\n");
00269         
00270         ++j;
00271         
00272         while(upTime() < curTime + j * TICKS_PER_SECOND);
00273         
00274         puts("\tShutting down drivers...");
00275         
00276         ++j;
00277         
00278         while(upTime() < curTime + j * TICKS_PER_SECOND);
00279         
00280         puts("...Done.\n\n");
00281         
00282         puts("Have a nice day!...Rebooting now...\n");
00283         
00284         ++j;
00285         
00286         while(upTime() < curTime + j * TICKS_PER_SECOND);
00287         
00288         return;
00289 }

00317 void pageFault(){
00318         char * aux;
00319         
00320         puts("Quiero escribir en  la posicion de memoria ");
00321         if(getpid() - 1 >= 0){
00322                 aux = processTable[getpid() - 1].dataUmalloc.mallocMem.allocp;
00323                 putx((int)aux);
00324                 *aux = 'a';     
00325         }else{
00326                 aux = processTable[getpid() + 1].dataUmalloc.mallocMem.allocp;
00327                 putx((int)aux);
00328                 *aux = 'a';
00329         }
00330         return;
00331 }
